data.title: Famous People Born in 1945
data.meta_description: Celebrate the birthdays of 931 famous people, historical figures and celebrities born in 1945 like Bob Marley, Eric Clapton and Rod Stewart.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 931

Gail Zappa (née Sloatman), American business secretary and wife of musician and composer Frank Zappa, born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania (d. 2015)

Jan 1 Glen Loates, Canadian artist and painter of wildlife and landscapes, born in Toronto, Ontario

Jan 1 Jacky Ickx, Belgian auto racer (24 Hours of Le Mans 1969, 75-77, 81-82; 8 x F1 wins; Dakar Rally 1983; Bathurst 1000 1977), born in Brussels, Belgium

Jan 1 Peter Duncan, Australian politician (Member of Parliament, 1984-96; Minister for Employment and Education, 1988-90), born in Melbourne, Australia)

Slobodan Praljak, Bosnian Croat general and war criminal, born in Čapljina, Independent State of Croatia (d. 2017)

Stephen Stills, American singer-songwriter and guitarist (Buffalo Springfield - "For What It's Worth"; Crosby, Stills & Nash - "Suite: Judy Blue Eyes"), born in Dallas, Texas

JayDee Maness, American pedal steel guitar player (Desert Rose Band - "Love Reunited"), born in Loma Linda, California

Jan 4 Richard R. Schrock, American chemist, Nobel laureate

Roger Spottiswoode, Canadian-British film director, born in Ottawa, Canada

Allen Appel, American novelist, born in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania

Ron Ellis, Canadian ice hockey right wing (Summit Series 1972; Stanley Cup 1967, 4 x NHL All Star; Toronto Maple Leafs), born in Lindsay, Ontario (d. 2024)

Rod Stewart

British singer ("Maggie Maey"; "Do Ya Think I'm Sexy"; "Downtown Train"), and model railroad designer, born in London, England

[Eileen] Joy[ce] Chant [Rutter], UK, sci-fi author (High Kings)
